evidence.text: Person B: Stella! I didn’t even see you…

Person A: Could you sign mine?
Person B: Why didn’t you come straight up?

Person B: Our Martha? Martha Hunt?
Person B: No… To be honest, I haven’t seen her in years. Martha, sick? I can’t imagine it…

Person A: I’m living in Boston now. I’ve come to see my son, and visit Martha in the hospital. You know that she has cancer, right? It’s a bad one.
Person A: Yes. She’s at Manhattan Memorial Cancer Center. I thought you’d have heard…
